CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, pg. 3 reads: "In Their Easter Bonnets...and pretty frocks, too, these darling little girls paraded their spring finery at a fashion review at A. Leo Weil School. Some wore quilted skirts and toppers while others preferred sheer dressy frocks.  Left to right: ...Sharon Turner..."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Sharon Turner modeling light colored dress with ruffled sleeves and ruffled skirt, holding overcoat and basket, standing on stage in A. Leo Weil school for Easter fashion show
CatSubject_tab: Girls--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Auditoriums--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.A. Leo Weil Elementary School (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Fashion models--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
